# GOPATH with p1 in d1, p2 in d2
env GOPATH=$WORK/d1${:}$WORK/d2

# build & install p1
go install -i p1
! stale p1 p2

# modify p2 - p1 should appear stale
cp $WORK/p2x.go $WORK/d2/src/p2/p2.go
stale p1 p2

# build & install p1 again
go install -i p1
! stale p1 p2

-- $WORK/d1/src/p1/p1.go --
package p1
import "p2"
func F() { p2.F() }

-- $WORK/d2/src/p2/p2.go --
package p2

-- $WORK/p2x.go --
